findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The smart contract allows minting of an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have proper protection against unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The permit function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The _mint function does not have any access control, allowing anyone to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap functions are declared as private but lack access control, allowing anyone to call them and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is marked as external and does not have any access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have proper protection, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor of the contract does not have any access modifier, making it public and allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Potential vulnerabilities in distributeRewardDividends function
findings.description: The distributeRewardDividends function has potential vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Potential vulnerabilities in withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function may contain potential vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Potential vulnerabilities in changeReward function
findings.description: The changeReward function has potential vulnerabilities.
